result.reason: Already fixed in current codebase — HandleProtocolClosed checks IsDisposed/Disposing before invoke and catches ObjectDisposedException, preventing the race condition when closing SSH tabs
result.approach: No action needed — the disposed-object guard (line 1677) and try/catch around BeginInvoke (lines 1686-1693) already prevent this crash

attempts.raw_output:
The fix is already in place. The `HandleProtocolClosed` method at line 1677 checks `IsDisposed || Disposing || !IsHandleCreated` before attempting to invoke, and the `BeginInvoke` call (replacing the original `Invoke`) is wrapped in try/catch for `ObjectDisposedException` and `InvalidOperationException`. This addresses the exact race condition described in issue #1822.
